item.description:
I will supply the protein... everyone bring a pot luck dish. Potato salad, chips, pickles, beverage, cole slaw, dessert, mac salad, toss, salad, relishes, fruit, etc... An evening get together and walk down to the Wilder access and watch the fireworks with our chairs, blankets.. Let me know what your thoughts are..
You can even bring your Kayak,.. be on the water to watch the fireworks.. of course far enough away.. but what a view...

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: FOURTH OF JULY COOK OUT AT MY HOME
